ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors would like to thank the District Officer of Segamat district and the community leaders of the five subdistricts of Segamat (Sungai Segamat, Bekok, Chaah, Gemereh, and Jabi) where SEACO conducts the multi-disciplinary, community-based, health-related research, for their dynamic support and cooperation.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: The work for this study was jointly provided by Dengue-DSTIN-Flagship MOSTI (NIBM/11â€“16/008), Infectious Disease and Health Cluster of the Tropical Medicine and Biology Platform of Monash University Malaysia (code 5140762), and the SEACO platforms of Monash University Malaysia (code 2500047). The funders had no role in developing the study protocol or preparing this paper.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: All data generated or analysed during this study are included in this article.
